> can you add a whatsnew note in Deprecation Removals

Done.

thanks @jbrockmendel 

keep em coming on this! (which should do before we remove PY2 stuff).

> My understanding is that we're removing Panel in 0.25.0.

I think what we discussed this summer was to have all bigger deprecations in 0.25 and remove them only before 1.0 (this is what is written down in https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/wiki/Pandas-Sprint-(July,-2018), and Panel is also listed in the section to remove in 1.0 in https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/6581).

But, given that Panel is already deprecated for a long time (and the process has already started now ..), I don't think I mind much removing it already. But just wanted to note that this might warranted some more discussion before directly starting to remove things to check everybody is on board with that.
